channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Congress passes Social Security Fairness Act, millions could benefit
Trump taps ‘Apprentice’ producer Mark Burnett as special envoy to UK and Tilman Fertitta as Italy ambassador
item.description: Trump also announced casino magnate Tilman Fertitta as his choice to be U.S. ambassador to Italy.

item.title: There’s now a 40% chance the Fed will pivot back to hiking rates again next year, top economist says
item.description: "For investors, it is starting to look similar to 2022—too high inflation, rising interest rates, and falling stock prices."

item.title: Banner year for fixed-income funds leaves TCW and Western Asset behind
As the wealthy keep spending, here’s why the middle class is in for a tough 2025
As government shutdown looms, how U.S. stocks performed during past closures
Trump’s daughter-in-law says she won’t seek US Senate seat
item.description: The president-elect said this week he didn’t expect DeSantis to appoint Lara Trump to the Senate.

item.title: As the wealthy keep spending, here’s why the middle class is in for a tough 2025
Russia’s war machine is running on fumes as industry warns of bankruptcies and the Kremlin gets old tanks from movie studio
item.description: Russia's largest movie studio donated about 50 tanks and armored vehicles from the 1950s that it had been using a props.

item.title: Amazon NYC warehouse targeted by Teamsters as strike expands
item.description: Workers at one of Amazon’s air cargo hubs, in San Bernadino, California, were also joining the strike as of Saturday afternoon.
